system.weapons:
4 Hardpoints for Weapons and/or Support Systems

Recommended Loadout: Two Fusion Cascades/Two twin-linked Burst Cannons/Two Phased Ion Guns, Vectored Retro Thrusters, Drone Controller/Target Lock
system.specialRules:
Battle Suit Strength: 65

Primary Systems: Blacksun Filter, Enhanced Motive Systems, Environmental Seal, Jet Pack, Multi-Tracker

Special: Equipped with Photon Casters, knee mounted dischargers that dazzle foes. As a Half Action or Reaction, the pilot can make +20 Ballistic Skill Test to activate, acts like Tau Photon Grenade centered on Self (Blast (12)).
